name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the options for CREATING a direct bank workers - compliance tab passport details section.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
justification: This test verifies core functionality related to user permissions and data input in compliance scenarios. It covers multiple components like the compliance tab and passport details, and tests security-sensitive operations associated with user permissions.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user the options for CREATING bank workers - compliance tab passport details section.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a CLIENT user (With EDIT Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
justification: Similar to UNO-T453, this test verifies core functionality and user permission handling. The compliance tab and passport details check involve multiple components and security-sensitive operations, ensuring that only authorized users can manage sensitive data.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN User Details save when creating a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

  • Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button

  • Create New Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

    • Display info icon with message ' Please make sure your bank details are complete and match the name of your bank account, as any errors may lead to your invoices not being paid or paid into the incorrect bank account.'

    • The following fields  are on this tab. 

    • Account Name field

    • Account Number field

    • Sort code Field

    • Tick box (I confirm I have entered bank details from a personal account not a limited company)

    • National Insurance Number / PPS Number field

    • UTR Number

    • VAT Number

    • Payroll Reference

    • Pension Opt in /out (Radio Box)

    • Select employment status dropdown

      • PAYE

      • LTD

      • SOLE TRADER

      • Other

    • Worker employment status other field

      • If ‘other’ selected in employment status dropdown

      • Enable typing into this field

    • Umbrella company dropdown

      • Yes 

      • No

    • Umbrella Company Name dropdown

    • Umbrella Company Name other 

      • Free type text box

      • Show helper text

      • Text box enabled when ‘other’ selected in Umbrella Company Name dropdown.

  •  All Details entered in this tab  and saved will be stored against the Bank workers profile for the Client.
justification: This test covers critical business processes involving financial data entry and validation. It includes complex data manipulations, multi-step user interactions, and integration of various financial details, making it a high-priority candidate for regression testing.

name: Verify as a CLIENT User Details save when creating a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

  • Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ button

  • Create New Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

    • Display info icon with message ' Please make sure your bank details are complete and match the name of your bank account, as any errors may lead to your invoices not being paid or paid into the incorrect bank account.'

    • The following fields  are on this tab. 

    • Account Name field

    • Account Number field

    • Sort code Field

    • Tick box (I confirm I have entered bank details from a personal account not a limited company)

    • National Insurance Number / PPS Number field

    • UTR Number

    • VAT Number

    • Payroll Reference

    • Pension Opt in /out (Radio Box)

    • Select employment status dropdown

      • PAYE

      • LTD

      • SOLE TRADER

      • Other

    • Worker employment status other field

      • If ‘other’ selected in employment status dropdown

      • Enable typing into this field

    • Umbrella company dropdown

      • Yes 

      • No

    • Umbrella Company Name dropdown

    • Umbrella Company Name other 

      • Free type text box

      • Show helper text

      • Text box enabled when ‘other’ selected in Umbrella Company Name dropdown.

  •  All Details entered in this tab  and saved will be stored against the Bank workers profile for the Client.
justification: Same as UNO-T455. Verifies financial data entry and validation for Client users, involving multiple data fields and critical business processes that must be validated to ensure correctness of financial transactions.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN User Details save when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

    • On Direct Bank Workers Page
    • Edit an existing Direct Bank Worker
  • Then:
    • On the Financials tab
      • Verify that changes made to this information in this tab save correctly.
justification: Ensures that modifications to financial data are correctly saved and validated. Involves multiple fields and complex data manipulations, critical for maintaining data integrity and preventing financial errors.

name: Verify as a CLIENT User Details save when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Finance Tab
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When:
  • On Direct Bank Workers Page

  • Edit an existing Direct Bank Worker

Then:

  • On the Financials tab

    • Verify that changes made to this information in this tab save correctly.
justification: Similar to UNO-T457 but for Client users. Verifies the correctness of financial data modifications, crucial for maintaining the integrity of client-side operations and financial transactions.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN User RWT when creating a new Direct Bank Worker - Compliance Tab
testScript:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :
  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker
Then :

  • On the Compliance Tab 

    • The right to work details will be show below Right to Work Details   Work Eligibility

      • there will be a Toggle to show if Right to Work Accepted

      • Select Document Type -Dropdown -Options

        • British Passport

        • EU Passport

        • Other

      • If 'OTHER' is selected the following will appear if Other is NOT SELCTED THE FOLLWOING WILL BE GRAYED OUT. reRIGHT TO WORK 

      • Provide Other RTW detail

      • RTW Reference Number

      • Date of Initial RTW Check

      • RTW Expiry Date

      • Settled Status - Dropdown - Options

        • UK Passport

        • Settled - Non UK Passport

        • Settled - UK Citizen - No Passport

        • Pre-Settled - Non UK Passport

      • Pre - Settled Start Date

        • Active only with ‘Pre - Settled’ is selected for ‘Settled Status’ otherwise greyed out

      • Pre - Settled Expiry Date

        • Active only with ‘Pre - Settled’ is selected for ‘Settled Status’ otherwise greyed out

These fields can be filled by users with above permissions.
justification: Validates 'Right to Work' compliance details for new users. Critical for ensuring legal compliance and integrating various document types and fields, with security-sensitive operations.

testScript:

name: Verify as a CLIENT User RWT when EDITING a new Direct Bank Worker - Compliance Tab
testScript:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :
    • Editing an existing Direct Banker worker. 
  • Then :
    • On the Compliance Tab

        • there will be a Toggle to show if Right to Work Accepted
        • Select Document Type -Dropdown -Options
          • British Passport
          • EU Passport
          • Other
        • If 'OTHER' is selected the following will appear if Other is NOT SELCTED THE FOLLWOING WILL BE GRAYED OUT. reRIGHT TO WORK 
        • Provide Other RTW detail

        • Settled Status - Dropdown - Options

  • These fields can be EDITED  by users with above permissions.
justification: Similar to UNO-T461 but for Client users. Verifies the updating and saving of compliance details, ensuring legal adherence and accurate data across various components and user roles.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that the DBS function pulls information correctly from the API.
testScript:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fieilds

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • Status of User is returned and all the fields are filled
    This screen then closes and the user can then close the main popup screen
justification: API integration test ensuring that data is correctly pulled and displayed. This test is critical as it covers data retrieval and validation from third-party services, impacting compliance and user information accuracy.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user that the DBS function gives an appropriate error when pulling incorrect or has mismatch date in the DBS API.
testScript:
Given :

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fields

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Forename (Null)

    • Status (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • When the DBS service check returns  ‘No Match Found’ we need an alert to highlight to the person performing the action the reason for this. For example;

    • Incorrect DBS number 
    • User is not registered on the DBS update service
    • Incorrect first name or surname
justification: Ensures proper error handling and data validation for API integrations. Critical for maintaining data accuracy and alerting users to potential issues in external data retrieval processes.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user that the DBS function pulls information correctly from the API.
testScript:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fieilds

  • Status of User is returned and all the fields are filled
    This screen then closes and the user can then close the main popup screen
justification: Similar to UNO-T463 but for Client users. Ensures correct API data integration and retrieval, essential for maintaining accurate and compliant user information.

testScript:
Given :
  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'
When :

  • Click Add New Direct Bank worker

  • Compliance Tab

Then :

  • On the compliance tab there is a ‘Check DBS Number’ Button -

  • When this is clicked a Pop up Opens - DBS Details

  • The pop up contains the following fields

    • DBS Number (Pre-filled with information in the compliance tab)

    • Surname (Null)

    • Print Date (Null) 

    • Check DBS Number Button

  • When the DBS Check button clicked

  • An API call is made to DBS website

  • When the DBS service check returns  ‘No Match Found’ we need an alert to highlight to the person performing the action the reason for this. For example;

    • Incorrect DBS number 
    • User is not registered on the DBS update service
    • Incorrect first name or surname
justification: Similar to UNO-T464 but for Client users. Ensures error handling and data validation for API integrations, maintaining the integrity and accuracy of user compliance data.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the creation and function of the user tab in the manage report page.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with manage reports permission. 
When :
  • On the report management page. 
Then :
  • Verify that there is a user tab on reports for both Neuven and client user reports that will allow each report to become user specific , meaning that only specific users for that client have aces to view/ run the report.
justification: Tests functionality related to user-specific report access, which is crucial for ensuring correct permissions and access management across various user roles.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user with specific permissions to view a report that there are no errors when viewing the report in question.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client 
When:
  • The client user is active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client has access to that report and can run it without any issue.
justification: Ensures the accuracy and accessibility of report viewing based on user-specific permissions. Critical for validating proper role-based access control (RBAC) implementations.

name: Verify as a Neuven user with specific permissions to view a report that there are no errors when viewing the report in question.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven user 
When:
  • The client user is active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client has access to that report and can run it without any issue.
justification: Similar to UNO-T468 but for Neuven users. Ensures report accessibility and accuracy based on user permissions, essential for effective role-based access control (RBAC).

name: Verify that User can only view report that match their user type.
testScript:
Given :
  • reports being restrict to either a neuven or a client report 
When :
  • Logged in as a client or a neuven user
Then :
  • When logging in as a specific user type with report permission verify that i can only see the relevant reports.
justification: Validates report visibility based on user type, ensuring appropriate data segregation and access control necessary for compliance and security.

name: Verify that a CLIENT User Who doesn't have permission to view a report can't see the report.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client 
When:
  • The client user is no active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The client does not have the report showing as an option on the reports page and cant access it.
justification: Ensures that unauthorized report access is restricted, validating role-based access control and securing sensitive data from unauthorized views.

name: Verify that a Neuven User Who doesn't have permission to view a report can't see the report.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven user 
When:
  • The Neuven user is no active on the view and running of a specific report 
Then:
  • The Neuven does not have the report showing as an option on the reports page and cant access it.
justification: Similar to UNO-T471 but for Neuven users. Verifies that unauthorized report access is restricted, ensuring effective role-based access control and data security.

name: Verify that the daily (Nightly) Check DBS Number API runs against all APPROVED bank workers.
testScript:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run.
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It only returns data relevant to approved bank workers.
justification: Ensures that the nightly API checks only run against approved records, crucial for maintaining correct compliance data and preventing unnecessary API calls.

name: Verify that the daily (Nightly) Check DBS Number API does not run against UNAPPROVED bank workers.
testScript:
Given – 
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  •  It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It doesn’t show any new data against workers who have been unapproved.
justification: Validates exclusion of unapproved records from API checks, crucial for ensuring data integrity and compliance while saving system resources.

name: Verify that the API only pick up records with 'NEW_INFO.'
testScript:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • It only picks up data with changes (NEW_INFO)
justification: Ensures the API only retrieves records with new information, crucial for optimizing data processing and avoiding redundant checks.

name: Verify the email with this information is sent to CLIENT USERS that are linked to the relevant LOCATION and have the 'Edit Direct Bank worker' permission.
testScript:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • If a client user has the edit direct back works permission flagged in their profile and   is in the same location and the direct bank worker. Then they will receive data about the direct bank worker.
justification: Validates the notification system for compliance checks, ensuring that only relevant users receive critical updates, important for maintaining effective communication and compliance.

name: Verify that other client users in the same location without the ‘Edit Direct Bank worker’ permission don’t receive an email.
testScript:
Given –
  • The Check DBS Number API has run. 
When –
  • It checked the DBS numbers. 
Then –
  • If a client user does not have edit direct back works permission flagged in their profile and   is in the same location and the direct bank worker. Then they will receive data about the direct bank worker.
justification: Ensures appropriate email notifications based on user permissions, critical for maintaining data privacy and reducing unnecessary notifications.
